- Hello and welcome back to Sortedfood.
You might remember a little time ago,
we went to a pop-up in London,

hosted by Josh and Ollie
from Korean Englishman,

and Barry and I, we were fed
three epic Korean toasts.
One of which used Picky Wicky's Kimchi.

So today we have teamed
up with Picky Wicky,
a Korean food brand.

We've given each of our normals
one tin of their kimchi,
and we're challenging them to come up
with something different, delicious
and downright creative.
Ready, boys?
